headline: Sensormatic Solutions Presents Vision to Redefine Retail at 2025 NRF Big Show
summary: NEUHAUSEN, Switzerland, January 07, 2025--Sensormatic Solutions, the leading global retail solutions portfolio of Johnson Controls (NYSE: JCI), will be at the 2025 NRF Big Show to showcase its most recent innovations—like its enhancements to Shrink Analyzer—alongside third-party solutions that are now available as part of its ecosystem of retail solutions and services. The brand will also serve as NRF’s exclusive people-counting partner in the Foodservice Innovation Zone (1st floor) and Galleria
